posts.post_content:
This is probably a long shot. I would like to trade the following Pattee for T213-1, T213-2 HOF, but would also consider other HOFers from other issues. I will also purchase T213 HOFers I need.
SOLD

[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url] with any questions.

Thanks
Mike
Mike- That's a fabulous card, tough to find in high grade as well....

Mr. Healer,

Unfortunately the Pattee card that you are offering does not have a Sovereign 150 back, nor is it in a PSA holder.  Nevertheless I am willing to consider a trade for the following card,

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10474/mcintyre-brooklyn-sov[/IMG]

Please draw your attention to the hideous stain on the reverse of the card, which suggests overgrading.  Despite this oversight I am sure that you can crack it out and resubmit it for a lower grade if you choose.

Because of the factors hignlighted in the first sentence of this post, an even swap would seem unfair and you might have to kick in a little cash.  Let's talk.;)
I may be interested Frank, how much cash would I have to kick in?
holy moly...an exceedingly rare sov 150.  Frank...i thought we were friends?

After being unable to hammer out a deal with Frank, he just wouldn't let go of the McIntyre, I figured I would see if there is any other interest in a trade.
Thanks, Mike.

[quote name="Mikehealer" post=1259699]After being unable to hammer out a deal with Frank, he just wouldn't let go of the McIntyre, I figured I would see if there is any other interest in a trade.
Thanks, Mike.[/QUOTE]

No, but I would offer $650 straight sale... thanks
